name: Likehack
tag_list: social, bookmarking, personalization, news, information-overload, curation, content
overview:
Likehack is a personal content aggregator for active internet users, who spend too much time searching, filtering and reading content and want to never miss or lose cool links they are interested in.

How it works:

  1. Likehack grabs all links and keywords from user’s accounts (FB, Twitter, e-mail, task tracker, etc) in real time to understand current user’s needs and interests.
  2. Then it finds people who shared the same links about concrete topic and provides to a user filtered and manually selected content both from his friends and like-minded people about his current needs and interests.
  3. At the same time Likehack saves all links user shares online into searchable collection.

The main advantage is that it’s totally frictionless. No special buttons, no learning, no browser extensions.

Likehack is acting like user’s friend, who knows what he is interested in and sends him a link he shouldn’t miss or helps him to recall where has he seen something he need right now.

milestones.description: Russian NewsFeed Service LikeHack Bags $150,000 Funding from Altair Capital
milestones.source_description: Russian NewsFeed Service LikeHack Bags $150,000 Funding from Altair Capital
